speaker: LEONINE
text_entry: SCENE II. Mytilene. A room in a brothel.

speaker: LEONINE
text_entry: Enter Pandar, Bawd, and BOULT

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Boult!

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Sir?

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Search the market narrowly; Mytilene is full of

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: gallants. We lost too much money this mart by being

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: too wenchless.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: We were never so much out of creatures. We have but

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: poor three, and they can do no more than they can

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: do; and they with continual action are even as good as rotten.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Therefore let's have fresh ones, whate'er we pay for

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: them. If there be not a conscience to be used in

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: every trade, we shall never prosper.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Thou sayest true: 'tis not our bringing up of poor

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: bastards,--as, I think, I have brought up some eleven--

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Ay, to eleven; and brought them down again. But

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: shall I search the market?

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: What else, man? The stuff we have, a strong wind

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: will blow it to pieces, they are so pitifully sodden.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Thou sayest true; they're too unwholesome, o'

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: conscience. The poor Transylvanian is dead, that

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: lay with the little baggage.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Ay, she quickly pooped him; she made him roast-meat

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: for worms. But I'll go search the market.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Exit

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Three or four thousand chequins were as pretty a

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: proportion to live quietly, and so give over.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Why to give over, I pray you? is it a shame to get

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: when we are old?

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: O, our credit comes not in like the commodity, nor

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: the commodity wages not with the danger: therefore,

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: if in our youths we could pick up some pretty

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: estate, 'twere not amiss to keep our door hatched.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Besides, the sore terms we stand upon with the gods

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: will be strong with us for giving over.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Come, other sorts offend as well as we.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: As well as we! ay, and better too; we offend worse.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Neither is our profession any trade; it's no

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: calling. But here comes Boult.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Re-enter BOULT, with the Pirates and MARINA

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: [To MARINA]  Come your ways. My masters, you say

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: she's a virgin?

speaker: First Pirate
text_entry: O, sir, we doubt it not.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Master, I have gone through for this piece, you see:

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: if you like her, so; if not, I have lost my earnest.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Boult, has she any qualities?

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: She has a good face, speaks well, and has excellent

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: good clothes: there's no further necessity of

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: qualities can make her be refused.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: What's her price, Boult?

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I cannot be bated one doit of a thousand pieces.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Well, follow me, my masters, you shall have your

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: money presently. Wife, take her in; instruct her

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: what she has to do, that she may not be raw in her

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: entertainment.

speaker: Pandar
text_entry: Exeunt Pandar and Pirates

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Boult, take you the marks of her, the colour of her

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: hair, complexion, height, age, with warrant of her

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: virginity; and cry 'He that will give most shall

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: have her first.' Such a maidenhead were no cheap

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: thing, if men were as they have been. Get this done

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: as I command you.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Performance shall follow.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Exit

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: Alack that Leonine was so slack, so slow!

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: He should have struck, not spoke; or that these pirates,

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: Not enough barbarous, had not o'erboard thrown me

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: For to seek my mother!

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Why lament you, pretty one?

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: That I am pretty.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Come, the gods have done their part in you.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: I accuse them not.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: You are light into my hands, where you are like to live.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: The more my fault

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: To scape his hands where I was like to die.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Ay, and you shall live in pleasure.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: No.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Yes, indeed shall you, and taste gentlemen of all

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: fashions: you shall fare well; you shall have the

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: difference of all complexions. What! do you stop your ears?

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: Are you a woman?

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: What would you have me be, an I be not a woman?

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: An honest woman, or not a woman.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Marry, whip thee, gosling: I think I shall have

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: something to do with you. Come, you're a young

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: foolish sapling, and must be bowed as I would have

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: you.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: The gods defend me!

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: If it please the gods to defend you by men, then men

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: must comfort you, men must feed you, men must stir

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: you up. Boult's returned.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Re-enter BOULT

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Now, sir, hast thou cried her through the market?

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I have cried her almost to the number of her hairs;

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I have drawn her picture with my voice.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: And I prithee tell me, how dost thou find the

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: inclination of the people, especially of the younger sort?

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: 'Faith, they listened to me as they would have

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: hearkened to their father's testament. There was a

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Spaniard's mouth so watered, that he went to bed to

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: her very description.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: We shall have him here to-morrow with his best ruff on.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: To-night, to-night. But, mistress, do you know the

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: French knight that cowers i' the hams?

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Who, Monsieur Veroles?

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Ay, he: he offered to cut a caper at the

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: proclamation; but he made a groan at it, and swore

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: he would see her to-morrow.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Well, well; as for him, he brought his disease

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: hither: here he does but repair it. I know he will

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: come in our shadow, to scatter his crowns in the

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: sun.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Well, if we had of every nation a traveller, we

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: should lodge them with this sign.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: [To MARINA]  Pray you, come hither awhile. You

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: have fortunes coming upon you. Mark me: you must

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: seem to do that fearfully which you commit

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: willingly, despise profit where you have most gain.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: To weep that you live as ye do makes pity in your

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: lovers: seldom but that pity begets you a good

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: opinion, and that opinion a mere profit.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: I understand you not.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: O, take her home, mistress, take her home: these

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: blushes of hers must be quenched with some present practise.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Thou sayest true, i' faith, so they must; for your

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: bride goes to that with shame which is her way to go

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: with warrant.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: 'Faith, some do, and some do not. But, mistress, if

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I have bargained for the joint,--

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Thou mayst cut a morsel off the spit.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I may so.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Who should deny it? Come, young one, I like the

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: manner of your garments well.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: Ay, by my faith, they shall not be changed yet.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Boult, spend thou that in the town: report what a

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: sojourner we have; you'll lose nothing by custom.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: When nature flamed this piece, she meant thee a good

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: turn; therefore say what a paragon she is, and thou

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: hast the harvest out of thine own report.

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: I warrant you, mistress, thunder shall not so awake

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: the beds of eels as my giving out her beauty stir up

speaker: BOULT
text_entry: the lewdly-inclined. I'll bring home some to-night.

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Come your ways; follow me.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: If fires be hot, knives sharp, or waters deep,

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: Untied I still my virgin knot will keep.

speaker: MARINA
text_entry: Diana, aid my purpose!

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: What have we to do with Diana? Pray you, will you go with us?

speaker: Bawd
text_entry: Exeunt
